name: tm03
effect: Teaches Water Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Psyshock to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Water Pulse Gen II: Curse Gen I: Swords Dance)

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Generates an ultrasonic wave that may confuse.
flavor_text.emerald: Generates an ultrasonic wave that may confuse.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: An attack with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the foe.
